column1: Nanjing, situated in the lower part of the Yangtze, has historically been the capital of various kingdoms and dynasties, with the reputation as the center of education.
column2: 南京地处长江下游，历史上曾是多朝古都，享有教育中心的美誉。

column1: In 258 CE, the Kingdom of Wu under the reign of Emperor Jing of Wu, founded a Confucian learning institute for the purpose of learning Six Arts.
column2: 公元 258 年，吴景帝治理下的吴国创立了一家儒家学校，以授“六艺”。

column1: In the first year of Jianwu reign (317), Taihsueh (太學) campus was built in today's Fuzimiao (夫子廟) area on the banks of Qinhuai River, and Nanking Imperial University began recruiting students from common families instead of only from noble families.
column2: 晋建武元年（317 年），在如今秦淮河畔的夫子庙地区设立太学，南京国子监开始招收来自普通家庭的学子，而不是只收贵胄子弟。

column1: Like its forerunner Chengjun (成均) and succeeding Shang Hsiang (上庠) founded by Yu (禹, 21st century BCE) in Chungyuan, the earliest recorded imperial higher learning institutions and their successors, it was the Kingdom's central university, which after Han dynasty excellent students from local schools could be selected to attend to pursue further education.
column2: 它的前身是成均和后来由禹（公元前 21 世纪）在中原创建的上庠，是有记载的最早的皇家高等学府及其继任学校，与这些学校一样，它是国家的中央大学，自汉朝之后，来自地方学校的优秀学子可由遴选进入大学继续深造。

column1: In 470 during the Former Song dynasty, the Imperial Central University (Zongmingguan) became a comprehensive institution combining higher education and research, with five divisions: Literature, History, Confucian Study, Xuan Study and Yin Yang Study.
column2: 470 年，在南朝宋明帝时期，总明观（皇家中央大学）成为结合了高等教育和研究的一座综合机构，设五科：文、史、儒、玄和阴阳。

column1: The campus of School of Literature and School of History were located in today's Nanjing University Gulou campus, west to Gulou (鼓樓) mountain, and the campus was moved to today's Chaotian Palace (朝天宮) area at the time when Wang Jian (王儉) was university president and the areas of study were narrowed, with a heavy focus on Confucian classics.
column2: 文学馆和史学馆位于如今南京大学鼓楼校区，在鼓楼山西面，后在王俭任国学校长时迁至如今的朝天宫地区，研究领域缩窄，主要集中在儒家经典。

column1: In the period the faculty members included such scholars and scientists as Zu Chongzhi (祖沖之), Ge Hong (葛洪), Wang Xizhi (王羲之), and students included such figures as Xiao Daocheng, Emperor Gao of Southern Qi who studied at School of Confucian Studies, and Zhong Rong, a founding scholar of poetics who graduated from division of literature.
column2: 在此期间，教员有祖冲之、葛洪、王羲之等学者和科学家，学生有在儒学馆求学的南齐高帝萧道成和毕业于文学馆的诗学创始学者钟嵘等著名人物。

column1: After the fall of Chen dynasty, the school was closed and later replaced by Nanking Academy (or Jiangzhou Academy, Jiangzhou Zhouxue) in Sui dynasty.
column2: 南朝陈灭亡后，学校关闭，隋朝时被江宁府学（或称江州州学）取代。

column1: In 937 when campus of the imperial national university was again in Fuzimiao area, Li Shandao, a scholar of the university, established another national school Lushan National Academy outside the capital city Nanking which is called Bailudong Shuyuan (White Deer Grotto Academy), a famous academy that hosted many renowned scholars including Zhu Xi, Lu Jiuyuan and Wang Yangming.
column2: 937 年，国子监再次迁回夫子庙地区，该校学者李善道在都城南京之外另建一所国家级学校庐山国学，称为白鹿洞书院，这所著名书院曾由朱熹、陆九渊和王阳明在内的许多知名学者主持。

column1: In 1382 the Imperial University (國子監 Kuotzuchien or Guozijian) moved campus from Nanking Fuzimiao area to south of Qintian Mountain (欽天山) and Xuanwu Lake (the area around Nanjing University campus before 1952.
column2: 1382 年，国子监从南京夫子庙地区迁往钦天山和玄武湖以南（1952 年以前的南京大学校园周边地区。

column1: In 1952 Nanjing University moved to Gulou and its engineering school was split and formed several independent colleges including Nanjing Institute of Technology, which at its peak spanning 10 Li and hosting near 10,000 students, and around there were institutes including Qintian Jian (Imperial Astronomy Institute) and Taiyi Yuan (Imperial Medical Institute).
column2: 1952 年，南京大学迁往鼓楼，该校工程学院被拆分，形成了包括南京理工学院在内的多所独立院校，鼎盛时绵延十里，拥有近万名学生，周围有钦天监（皇家天文学院）和太医院（皇家医学院）等机构。

column1: In 1403 Peking Guozijian (Beijing Guozijian, Imperial University of Peking) was established.
column2: 1403 年，北京国子监设立。

column1: The Imperial University of Nanking (南京國子監) developed and flourished in the period, consisting of six schools: three basic level colleges (Chengyi, ChongChih, Guangye), two middle level schools (Hsiudao, Chenghsin) and one advanced level school (Shuaihsing), altogether 4 years to complete according to the system, one and a half years for both of the former two levels and one year for the latter level, to achieve 8 credit points a year and then upon graduation Chushen (qualification, diploma) would be awarded, with subjects including Confucian classics, history, literature, mathematics, law, calligraphy, equestrianism and archery, etc.
column2: 南京国子监在这一时期发展壮大，设六堂：三个基础学部（正义、崇志、广业），两个中级学部（修道、诚心）和一个高级学部（率性），按这一体系，完成学习共需四年，前两个阶段各需一年半，后一阶段一年，一年修 8 个学分，毕业时授予“初审”（资格、学位），科目包括儒家经典、史、文、算、法、书、骑、射。

column1: Yongle Encyclopedia was completed at Imperial Nanking University in 1408 after five years compilation, 9169 scholars selected from nationwide took part in it, thereinto 2180 were student scholars of the university.
column2: 经过五年编纂，《永乐大典》于 1408 年在南京国子监成书，全国各地遴选出的 9169 名学者参与其中，其中 2180 人为国子监学生。

column1: The publishing house of the imperial university of Nanking had been a publishing centre for several hundred years.
column2: 南京国子监的印刷部门几百年来一直都是出版中心。

column1: Wu Cheng'en, Tang Hsiantzu and Zheng Chenggong studied there during the Ming dynasty.
column2: 明朝时，吴承恩、汤显祖和郑成功均在此求学。

column1: Each time when Nanking became a non-capital city, the Nanking Imperial University was changed to be regional Nanking Academy.
column2: 每一次，当南京不再作为国都时，南京国子监就改为地区性的江宁府学。

column1: The Imperial Nanking University was changed to Nanking Academy (江寧府學, Jiangning Fuxue) in 1650 after Qing dynasty replaced Ming dynasty, and in 1865 after Taiping Rebellion the academy was relocated to Chaotian Palace.
column2: 清朝取代明朝之后，南京国子监于 1650 年改为江宁府学，太平天国运动之后，于 1865 年迁往朝天宫。

column1: The ancient school history was recognized during ROC.
column2: 古代校史在中华民国时期得到承认。

column1: In 1954 the school authority controlled by CPC decided to set the year starting to establish the modern new type school Sanjiang Normal College as the school's new founding year.
column2: 1954 年，中国共产党治下的校方决定把开始设立现代新型学校三江师范学堂的那一年作为该校新的建校年份。

column1: In 1902, Sanjiang Normal College (三江師範學堂) under the new educational system, using Japanese modern higher institutions of learning as references, was beginning to be established to replace the traditional Chinese school Nanking Academy, and was opened in the next year, with campus constructed south to Qintian Mountain.
column2: 1902 年，以日本现代高等学府为参照，新式教育体系下的三江师范学堂开始建立，以取代传统的中式学堂江宁府学，并于第二年开办，校区建在钦天山以南。

column1: The name was changed to Liangjiang Normal College (兩江師範學堂) in 1906, and the new president Li Ruiqing (李瑞清) established the first faculty of modern art in China.
column2: 1906年，校名改为两江师范学堂，新校长李瑞清建立了中国第一个现代艺术专业。

column1: In 1915 after the Republic of China replaced Qing dynasty, the Nanking Higher Normal School (南京高等師範學校) was founded to replace Liangjiang Higher Normal School which was closed three years before due to Xinhai Revolution, Jiang Qian (江謙) was appointed as the president.
column2: 中华民国取代清朝之后，1915 年成立南京高等师范学校，取代三年前因辛亥革命而关闭的两江优等师范学堂，任命江谦为校长。

column1: The school established the China's first faculty of modern gymnastics (physical education) in 1916.
column2: 该校于 1916 年成立了中国首个现代体操（体育）专业。

column1: In 1920 the school consisted of five colleges: Liberal Arts, Agriculture, Engineering, Commerce and Education.
column2: 1920 年，学校由五个学院组成：文理、农学、工程、商业和教育。

column1: The "China Science Society" (中國科學社), a major science organization in the modern history of China, founded its headquarter in the school in 1918.
column2: “中国科学社”是中国现代史上一个重要的科学组织，于 1918 年在该校设立总部。

column1: Its members established "Academia Sinica" (中央研究院) which was later moved to Taiwan and known as the "Chinese Academy of Sciences" (中國科學院) in mainland China.
column2: 其成员成立了“中央研究院”，后迁往台湾，在中国大陆被称为“中国科学院”。

column1: Numerous Chinese modern science pioneers, most of whom studied in America and some European countries such as Britain, France, and Germany, converged there to found many fields of science in China.
column2: 数不清的中国现代科学先驱纷纷来到这里，在中国建立许多科学领域，其中大部分人都曾在美国以及英、法、德等一些欧洲国家求学。

column1: It became the Chinese cradle of modern science.
column2: 这里成为中国现代科学的摇篮。

column1: Among 81 academicians of "Academia Sinica" elected for the first time in 1948, five entered or graduated from the university in 1920.
column2: 在 1948 年“中央研究院”首次选出的 81 名院士中，有五人曾于 1920 年进入或毕业于这所大学。

column1: More than half of the leading Chinese scientists whose works were published in scientific journals in the early period of Chinese modern science were graduates or academics of Nanjing University.
column2: 在中国现代科学早期，曾在科学期刊上发表成果的中国主要科学家中，有一半以上均毕业于南京大学或是南京大学学者。

column1: Kuo Ping-wen (Guo Bingwen, 郭秉文), an influential university president, was appointed in 1919 after Jiang Qian.
column2: 郭秉文是一位有影响力的大学校长，于 1919 年受任接替江谦。

column1: The school meeting passed The Audit Law for Women Students (《規定女子旁聽法案》) on December 7, 1919, as result of efforts of the educationist T'ao Hsing-chih (Tao Xingzhi, 陶行知), as well as the president Guo Bingwen, and the professors including Liu Boming (劉伯明), Luh Chih-wei (Lu Zhiwei, 陸志偉), Yang Hsingfo (Yang Xingfo, 楊杏佛), etc., and then decided to formally recruit female students.
column2: 在教育家陶行知和校长郭秉文以及刘伯明、陆志伟、杨杏佛等多位教授的努力下，校会议于 1919 年 12 月 7 日通过了《规定女子旁听法案》，然后决定正式招收女学生。

column1: The school became the first higher learning institution in China to recruit coeducational students.
column2: 该校成为中国第一所招收男女同校学生的高等学府。

column1: It enrolled eight women students in the first year 1920, and in addition, more than 50 female auditing students were admitted.
column2: 该校于 1920 年第一年录取了八位女生，此外还招收了 50 多名女性旁听生。

column1: In 1921 the National Southeastern University (國立東南大學) was founded, and in 1923 Nanking Higher Normal School was merged into it.
column2: 1921 年，国立东南大学成立，1923 年，南京高等师范学校并入该校。

column1: In the autumn of 1921, the Faculty of Business established in 1917 was moved to Shanghai to establish the first business school conferring degrees in China.
column2: 1921 年秋，成立于 1917 年的商科迁至上海，建立了中国第一所授予学位的商学院。

column1: The university consisted of five colleges (or schools) at the time: Liberal Arts (including departments of Chinese literature, foreign literature, history, philosophy, psychology，mathematics, physics, chemistry, biology, geoscience, and the Department of Politics, Law and Economics), Education, Agriculture, Engineering, and Commerce (or Business, including departments of general commerce, business administration, accounting, finance, economics, international trade, etc.), and soon later the College of Liberal Arts was divided to be College of Humanities and College of Sciences.
column2: 当时该大学分为五个学院：文理学院（包括中国文学系、外国文学系、历史系、哲学系、心理学系、数学系、物理系、化学系、生物系、地理系，和政法经济系）、教育学院、农学院、工程学院和商学院（或商业学院，包括普通商业、工商管理、会计、金融、经济、国际贸易等系），不久之后文理学院划分成人文学院和理学院。

column1: The earliest modern scientific research laboratories and groups in China were established at the university.
column2: 中国最早的现代科学研究实验室和团体均成立于该校。

column1: It integrated teaching and research, with status of university's independence and academic freedom, and was regarded as the earliest Chinese modern university.
column2: 它集教学和研究于一体，凭借该校的独立地位和学术自由，被视为中国最早的现代大学。

column1: The university along with its affiliated primary school and middle school served as a pioneer and model which laid the foundations for the establishment of modern educational system (壬戌學制, Renhsü Hsüehchih, 1922) in China, and in addition, its experimental kindergarten (Gulou Kindergarten) founded in 1923 was later also adopted as the model for Chinese kindergartens (Kindergarten Courses Standards by Ministration of Education, 1932), including its teaching system, teaching materials, teaching methods and teaching tools.
column2: 该校及其附属的小学和中学作为先锋及典范，为中国建立现代教育体系（壬戌学制，1922 年）奠定了基础，此外，该校创办于 1923 年的实验幼儿园（鼓楼幼儿园），其教学体系、教学材料、教育方法和教学工具等在之后也被纳为中国幼儿园（教育部幼儿园课程标准，1932年）的典范。

column1: In October 1921, "Hsuehheng Society" (or Xueheng Society, 學衡社) was founded in the university which was the focus of the "Hsuehheng School" included the scholars Liu Yizheng (柳詒徵), Liu Boming (劉伯明), Mei Guangdi (梅光迪), Wu Mi (吳宓) and Hu Hsien-Hsu (Hu Xiansu, 胡先驌).
column2: 1921 年 10 月，学衡社在该校成立，以“学衡学派”为侧重，包括柳诒征、刘伯明、梅光迪、吴宓和胡先骕等学者。

column1: They reinvigorated Confucian culture and humanism and published the monthly "Critical Review" (Xueheng, 學衡 in Chinese) in January 1922.
column2: 他们重振了儒家文化和人文精神，于 1922 年1 月出版月刊《学衡》。

column1: It enabled Nanjing University to become a center of Confucian thought and humanistic scholarship.
column2: 这使得南京大学成为儒家思想和人文学术的中心。

column1: During this period, Nanjing University was known as the foremost "Oriental Education Centre" and recognized as an academic and cultural exchange centre for east and west.
column2: 在这一时期，南京大学被称为第一流的“东方教育中心”，并被公认为东西方学术和文化交流中心。

column1: Many scholars visited and instructed there, including the American educationist Paul Monroe, W. H. Kilpatrick, E. L. Thorndike, philosopher John Dewey, British philosopher Bertrand Russell, German philosopher Hans Driesch and the Indian (also Bengali) poet Rabindranath Tagore.
column2: 许多学者前来访问、讲学，其中包括美国的教育学家保罗·孟禄、克伯屈、桑代克、哲学家约翰·杜威，英国哲学家罗素、德国哲学家杜里舒和印度（及孟加拉）诗人泰戈尔。

column1: The university became the capital national university after Nanking was made the capital by Nationalist Government, initially renamed National Dyisyi Chungshan University (or called National Nanking Chungshan University) in June 1927 when National Southeastern University merged eight public schools in Jiangsu province, and was renamed Jiangsu University in February 1928, and in May 1928, it was renamed National Central University (國立中央大學).
column2: 继国民党政府定都南京之后，该校成为首都的国立大学，在 1927 年 6 月国立东南大学合并江苏省八所公立学校时，最初改名为国立第四中山大学（或国立南京中山大学），1928 年 2 月改为江苏大学，1928 年 5 月改名国立中央大学。

column1: At the time there were eight colleges (or schools): Humanity, Social Science, Natural Science, Engineering, Education, Commerce, Agriculture, and Medicine.
column2: 当时设八个学院：人文、社会科学、自然科学、工程、教育、商业、农业和医学。

column1: The College of Commerce moved to Shanghai in 1921 and College of Medicine established in Shanghai in 1927 were split from the university in 1932.
column2: 商学院于 1921 年迁往上海，1927 年在上海成立的医学院则在 1932 年从该校分离。

column1: In 1935 College of Medicine was again established, in Nanjing.
column2: 1935 年，医学院重新在南京成立。

column1: During the Anti-Japanese War between 1937 and 1945, the university moved to Chongqing, while the College of Medicine and Department of Animal Husbandry & Veterinary Medicine of College of Agriculture moved to Chengdu.
column2: 1937年 至 1945 年抗日战争期间，学校迁往重庆，医学院和农学院畜牧兽医系迁往成都。

column1: The Chinese Association of Natural Science (中華自然科學社) was originated at the university in 1927 and adopted the name next year, which was the second largest scientific organization in China in 1949, after China Science Society.
column2: 中华自然科学社 1927 年在该校创始，次年采用这一名称，1949 年时是中国第二大科学组织，仅次于中国科学社。

column1: China Association of Scientific Workers (中國科學工作者協會) was founded in the university in 1944.
column2: 1944 年，中国科学工作者协会在该大学成立。

column1: China Science Society and the associations were merged to be the China Association for Science and Technology (中國科學技術協會) in 1958 in Beijing.
column2: 中国科学社与多家协会 1958 年在北京合并成为中国科学技术协会。

column1: The Natural Science Forum was initiated by the university faculties in 1939, which was later renamed Jiusan Forum (Sept.
column2: 自然科学座谈会由多位大学教授于 1939 年创建，后改名九三座谈会

column1: 3rd Forum) and became Jiusan Society in 1945, an organization for intellectual groups in China.
column2: ，1945 年成为九三学社，是中国知识分子的一个组织。

column1: In the united college entrance examinations beginning in 1937, about two-thirds of students put the university as the first choice.
column2: 在 1937 年开始的大学入学联考中，约有三分之二的学生把这所大学作为第一志愿。

column1: It became the first Chinese university enrolling blind college student, when enrolled Luo Fuxin (羅福鑫) in 1942.
column2: 1942 年录取罗福鑫，成为中国第一所招收盲人大学生的大学。

column1: In 1949, during the late time of Chinese Civil War, the central government of the Republic of China retreated from Nanking and the National Central University was renamed National Nanking University (National Nanjing University, 國立南京大學) after Nanking was controlled by CPC army, before the establishment of People's Republic of China.
column2: 1949 年，在解放战争后期，中华民国中央政府撤离南京，在解放军占领南京之后至中华人民共和国成立之前，国立中央大学改名为国立南京大学。

column1: In 1952, many colleges and departments, mainly colleges of education (or teacher, normal, including art and physical education departments), engineering, agriculture, and medicine, were split from Nanjing University, and many new independent schools were formed, including Nanjing Normal University, Nanjing Institute of Technology which was located at former Nanjing University site and later renamed Southeast University, etc.
column2: 1952 年，许多院系从南京大学拆分出来，主要是教育学院（或教师学院、师范学院，包括艺术和体育系）、工程学院、农学院和医学院，新成立了一批独立学校，包括南京师范大学、南京理工学院（位于南京大学原址，后改名为东南大学）等。

column1: At the same time, University of Nanking (金陵大學), a private university established in 1888 and sponsored by American churches, was merged into Nanjing University (南京大學), which lost its "national" appellation in 1950 to reflect the reality that all universities in the PRC would be public, and Nanjing University moved campus to the site of University of Nanking where was west to Gulou Mountain and was also once the site of imperial Nanjing University in ancient times.
column2: 与此同时，1888 年创建并得到美国教会赞助的私立大学金陵大学并入南京大学，该校在 1950 年去掉了“国立”称号，以反应中华人民共和国的所有大学均为公立学校这一现实，南京大学校园搬迁至鼓楼山以西的金陵大学校址，那里在古代也曾是南京国子监的所在地。

column1: A separate National Central University was reinstated in Taiwan by its old alumni association in 1962.
column2: 另一所国立中央大学由老校友会于 1962 年在台湾恢复。

column1: During the period of communist society including the period of Proletarian Cultural Revolution, the school suffered heavily.
column2: 在共产主义社会时期，包括在无产阶级文化大革命期间，学校遭受重创。

column1: In 1976, Nanjing University faculty members and students launched Anti Cultural Revolution Force Movement which was called "Nanjing Incident" by the authorities of the time, spreading countrywide.
column2: 1976 年，南京大学师生发起了被当时政府称为“南京事件”的反文革势力运动，席卷全国。

column1: In 1978, Hu Fuming, a faculty member of Nanjing University in philosophy, wrote the historic article entitled "Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth", and after being published it led to the nationwide "Debate on Standards for Judging the Truth", and thus in certain degree liberated thought and promoted the ending of Cultural Revolution and the coming of reform era.
column2: 1978 年，南京大学哲学系教授胡福明撰写了题为《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》的历史性文章，文章发表后，引发全国范围的“真理判断标准大讨论”，从而在一定程度上解放了思想，推动了文革的结束和改革时代的到来。

column1: Many faculties have been reestablished or newly founded since the Reform after 1978, e.g., law reestablished in 1981, medical school in 1987, environmental department newly founded in 1984.
column2: 1978 年改革之后，重新设立或新成立了许多院系，如 1981 年重设法律系、1987 年重设医学院、1984 年新成立环境系。

column1: Some departments were divided into two or more departments, e.g., the Chinese language and literature department divided into departments of language & linguistics, literature, philology and drama arts, or some new faculties came out of older faculties, e.g., computer came out of mathematics, urban planning came out of geography, in many case formed integratively, i.e., formed based on parts of two or more faculties, e.g., parts of faculties of physics and chemistry integratively formed material faculty.
column2: 有些系划分成两个系或更多系，如中国语言文学系分成语言学系、文学系、语文和戏剧艺术系，还有一些新的系脱胎自旧的系，比如计算机系来自数学系，城市规划系来自地理系，在许多情况下是综合形成，即在两个或两个以上的系的基础上形成，比如综合了物理系和化学系的一部分教授组成材料系。

column1: In around 1990 the university consisted of schools (colleges) of Humanities, Sciences, Technological Sciences, Medicine, Business, etc..
column2: 1990 年前后，该大学由人文、理学、技术科学、医学、商学等学院组成。

column1: Then many departments became schools, e.g., mathematics, physics, chemistry, or grouped into new schools, e.g., architecture and urban planning.
column2: 之后，许多系升为学院，如数学、物理、化学，或一同并入新学院，如建筑和城市规划学院。

column1: The size of university significantly expanded during the years.
column2: 这些年来，该大学的规模显著扩大。

column1: In 2009, Xianlin Campus opened to undergraduates, replacing Pukou Campus which was in use since 1993, and Pukou Campus became the campus of NJU Jinling College, an independent private college directed by NJU.
column2: 2009 年，仙林校区向本科生开放，取代自 1993 年以来一直使用的浦口校区，浦口校区则成为由南京大学领导的独立民办学院南京大学金陵学院的所在地。

column1: The Xianlin campus now is a main campus along with Gulou campus.
column2: 仙林校区目前与鼓楼校区同为主校区。

column1: More than 1500 years ago, ancient University of Nanjing founded the earliest faculties of literature, history, etc..
column2: 1500 多年前，古代的南京大学创办了最早的文学、历史等院系。

column1: In modern times, Nanjing University established Chinese first faculties of art, gymnastics, biology, psychology, business management, etc..
column2: 在近代，南京大学建立了中国第一批艺术、体操、生物、心理、工商管理等院系...

column1: Its faculties, departments and schools have been changed and evolved timely.
column2: 其教师、院系已及时得到改变和发展。

column1: For example, in 1921, the university consisted of 5 schools: liberal arts, education, agriculture, engineering and business, in 1928 the school of liberal arts had become three schools, and the university consisted of 8 schools: humanities, social sciences, natural sciences, education, agriculture, engineering, business and medicine, and now, many former departments of humanities, natural sciences and social sciences have become schools.
column2: 例如，1921 年，该大学由 5 个学院组成：文科、教育、农学、工程和商业，1928 年文科学院变成三个学院，学校分为 8 个学院：人文、社会科学、自然科学、教育、农学、工程、商业和医学，现在，许多曾隶属于人文、自然科学和社会科学学院的系成为了学院。

column1: The system of academic degree or diploma has also been changed.
column2: 学术学位或文凭的体系也发生了变化。

column1: In the early years of ROC the university adopted the system similar to western especially American universities and began to award bachelor's degree.
column2: 在中华民国早年间，该校采用与西方尤其是美国大学类似的体系，开始授予学士学位。

column1: The university founded China's first modern laboratories in physics, chemistry, etc..
column2: 这所大学创办了物理、化学等领域的中国第一批现代实验室。

column1: In 1922, the university professors founded The Biology Research Institute of Science Society of China, the first modern scientific research institute in China, integrated with the university's biology department.
column2: 1922 年，该校多位教授成立了中国科学社生物研究所，是中国第一个现代科学研究所，与该校生物系相结合。

column1: With the aid of Rockefeller Foundation, Science Centre was constructed in 1924 and completed three years later.
column2: 在洛克菲勒基金会的资助下，科学中心于 1924 年动工，三年后建成。

column1: In 1926 the university passed The General Regulation of Graduate Institute.
column2: 1926 年，学校通过了《研究院简章》。

column1: China's first doctor's degree was awarded by the school of medicine of the university in 1931.
column2: 1931 年，中国第一个博士学位由该大学医学院授予。

column1: Soon the educational system was changed.
column2: 不久，教育体系发生变化。

column1: In the early 1980s after a period of transformation, universities in mainland China resumed to award doctor's degrees, and graduate and undergraduate education were integrated into departments and schools.
column2: 20 世纪 80 年代初，经过一段时间的转型，中国大陆的大学恢复博士学位授予，研究生和本科生教育被整合到各院系。

column1: Nanjing University is the first in mainland China to award doctor's degrees in such fields as Chinese studies, world history, computer science.
column2: 南京大学是中国大陆第一家授予中国研究、世界历史、计算机科学等领域博士学位的大学。

column1: It is distinguished in many fields including Chinese Language and Literature, and natural sciences.
column2: 在包括中国语言和文学以及自然科学在内的许多领域，它都十分出色。

column1: Its faculty, including part-time faculty, includes more than twenty Nobel Laureates engaged in teaching.
column2: 该校教授，包括兼职教授在内，有二十多位诺贝尔奖得主从事教学工作。

column1: The university is a Double First Class University Plan university in 15 academic disciplines.
column2: 该大学在 15 个学科领域均为“双一流大学计划”大学。

column1: Nanjing University has three main campuses: Gulou, Xianlin and Pukou campus.
column2: 南京大学有三个主校区：鼓楼校区、仙林校区和浦口校区。

column1: The distance between Gulou and Xianlin campus is about 18 kilometers.
column2: 鼓楼校区和仙林校区之间相距约 18 公里。

column1: Gulou Campus is located in Gulou District, at the center of Nanjing City.
column2: 鼓楼校区位于鼓楼区，地处南京市中心。

column1: The main campus itself is divided into two sections by Hankou Road: North Garden, Bei Yuan, is where teaching and research take place; and South Garden, Nan Yuan, serves as the living area for both students and academic staff.
column2: 主校区被汉口路一分为二：北园为教学和研究所在地；南园则是学生与教职员工的生活区。

column1: Pukou Campus is situated in the suburban Pukou District, by the northern side of Nanjing New & High-Tech Industry Development Zone, and became part of Nanjing University in 1993. Once Pukou campus hosted undergraduate freshmen, sophomore and junior students.
column2: 浦口校区位于市郊的浦口区，靠南京高新技术产业开发区北侧，1993 年成为南京大学的一部分。浦口校区曾供大一、大二和大三学生使用。

column1: In 2009, the Pukou campus became the campus hosted the undergraduate students in Nanjing University Jinling College, which was founded by Nanjing University in 1998.
column2: 2009 年，浦口校区成为南京大学于 1998 年成立的南京大学金陵学院的本科生校区。

column1: Nanjing University Biomedical Research Institute is also located in Pukou.
column2: 南京大学生物医学研究所也在浦口校区。

column1: Xianlin Campus is located in the northeast of Nanjing, in the Xianlin Universities Town, south of Yangtse River and Qixia Mountain, east of Purple Mountain, and west of Baohua Mountain.
column2: 仙林校区位于南京东北部的仙林大学城，在长江和栖霞山以南，紫金山以东，宝华山以西。

column1: The campus is home to undergraduate students and parts of graduate students.
column2: 该校区是本科生和部分研究生日常活动的地方。

column1: It was opened in September 2009.
column2: 2009 年 9 月投入使用。

column1: There is the stop of Nanjing University Xianlin Campus on Line 2 of Nanjing Subway, which enables Xianlin and Gulou campus to be connected through subway.
column2: 南京地铁 2 号线设有南京大学仙林校区站，使得仙林校区和鼓楼校区通过地铁连接起来。

column1: Known as Second Automobile Works (第二汽车制造厂) until 1992, Dongfeng, or "East Wind" in Chinese, was founded in 1969.
column2: 东风成立于 1969 年，在 1992 年之前，一直被称为第二汽车制造厂。

column1: Its origins lie in a dictate of Chairman Mao Zedong; as part of his "Third Front" strategy, its far inland location in Hubei Province was meant to protect it from foreign invasion.
column2: 该厂起源于毛泽东主席的一项命令；作为“三线”战略的一部分，该厂坐落于湖北省内陆地区，旨在保护其免遭外国入侵。

column1: Traditionally manufacturing commercial vehicles, by 2001 these made up about 73% of Dongfeng's production.
column2: 东风历来制造商用车，到 2001 年，这些车辆约占其产量的 73%。

column1: By 2012, that figure had reversed, and 73% of manufactures were passenger cars.
column2: 到 2012 年，这一数字发生逆转，生产的 73% 为乘用车。

column1: However, the percentage of consumer offerings was likely lower as passenger car counts may include microvans, tiny commercial vehicles that are popular in China.
column2: 但消费类车辆的百分比可能较低，因为乘用车数量可能包括微型面包车，这是一种在中国广受欢迎的小型商用车。

column1: Between 1978-1985 alongside the market-based Chinese economic reforms instituted by Deng Xiaoping, Dongfeng was transformed from a manufacturer of two heavy-duty trucks with fragmented operations and ownership into a single, centrally managed enterprise.
column2: 1978-1985年间，伴随着邓小平制定的以市场为基础的中国经济改革，东风公司从一家生产两种重型卡车、业务和所有权极为分散的制造企业，转变为一家集中管理的单一企业。

column1: This process included placing all Dongfeng operations—from part manufacture to vehicle assembly—under the control of a single business entity and the merger of six truck production bases as well as a number of other companies previously controlled by provincial governments.
column2: 这一过程包括将东风公司的所有业务——从零件制造到车辆组装——由一个单一的商业实体来控制，合并六个卡车生产基地和以前由省政府控制的其他一些公司。

column1: Post-1985, further reforms took place that allowed Dongfeng greater autonomy; the company was removed from the direct administrative control of the central government.
column2: 1985 年后，进一步的改革使东风公司获得了更大的自主权；该公司脱离了中央政府的直接行政管辖。

column1: By the mid-1980s, its assets had tripled from those initially given to it by the state in 1981, and management was desirous of even greater production capacity.
column2: 到 20 世纪 80 年代中期，其资产已经比 1981 年国家最初拨给的增加了两倍，管理层希望有更大的产能。

column1: But in 1995, the company was experiencing financial difficulties as was the case with many Chinese automobile manufacturers at this time.
column2: 但在 1995 年，该公司与当时许多中国汽车制造商一样遭遇了财政困难。

column1: The situation was still dire in 1998 precipitating a 1999 restructuring of the company.
column2: 1998 年，形势依然严峻，促使公司于 1999 年进行重组。

column1: This state owned enterprise has come into conflict with authority at both the national and provincial levels.
column2: 这家国有企业与国家机构和省级机构产生了冲突。

column1: Alongside First Automobile Works it saw the successful dismantling of the Automobile Corporation, a central government entity presumably tasked with preventing non-competitive business practices through dictating output volumes and curtailing purchasing as well as exasperation at the right of the State to make managerial appointments.
column2: 它与第一汽车制造厂一同见证了中国汽车工业公司的成功解散，据推测这家中央政府实体的任务是通过控制产量和缩减采购，来防止非竞争性的商业行为以及对国家任命管理人员的权利的愤慨。

column1: The Chinese partner in many Sino-foreign joint venture companies, Dongfeng initiated most of these cooperative efforts with foreign firms in the early 2000s.
column2: 作为许多中外合资公司的中方合作伙伴，东风公司在 21 世纪初发起了与外国公司的大部分合作。

column1: But its first was established in 1992 with French PSA Group.
column2: 但其首次尝试是在 1992 年与法国标致雪铁龙集团合作。

column1: Known as Dongfeng Citroën Automobile Company (DCAC), it was the forerunner to the current Dongfeng Peugeot-Citroën Automobile Limited (DPCA).
column2: 该公司名为神龙汽车有限公司（DCAC），是目前东风标致雪铁龙汽车有限公司（DPAC）的前身。

column1: By 2003, Dongfeng had established joint ventures with Kia Motors (Dongfeng Yueda Kia, 2002), Honda (Dongfeng Honda, 2003), and Nissan (Dongfeng Motor Co., Ltd., 2003).
column2: 到 2003 年，东风已与起亚汽车（东风悦达起亚，2002年）、本田（东风本田，2003年）和日产（东风汽车有限公司，2003年）成立了合资企业。

column1: As of 2011, it had more Sino-foreign joint ventures than any other Chinese automaker, and the 2013 creation of a partnership with French Renault means it retains this title today.
column2: 截至 2011 年，该公司拥有的中外合资企业比任何其他中国汽车制造商都要多，而 2013 年与法国雷诺集团建立伙伴关系意味着该公司今天依然保持这一名号。

column1: In 2004, intermediate holding company of the group, Dongfeng Motor Group, became a listed company in the Hong Kong Stock Exchange; Dongfeng Yueda Kia remained in the unlisted portion of the group.
column2: 2004 年，集团的中间控股公司东风汽车集团有限公司在香港证券交易所上市，东风悦达起亚仍是该集团的非上市部分。

column1: Dongfeng announced in November 2006 that they intend to sell their vehicles in Japan.
column2: 东风公司于 2006 年 11 月宣布有意在日本销售其车辆。

column1: In 2009, it sold 1.9 million vehicles ranking second among domestic automakers and third overall.
column2: 2009 年，该公司售出 190 万辆汽车，在国内汽车制造商中排名第二，总体排名第三。

column1: At the 2010 Beijing Auto Show, Dongfeng displayed an electric vehicle concept car, a physical representation of its vow to bring an electric car to market by 2015.
column2: 在 2010 年北京车展上，东风公司展示了一辆电动概念汽车，具体兑现了其在 2015 年之前向市场推出电动汽车的誓言。

column1: China subsidises oil, an incentive for the State to spur alternative energy vehicle development, and Chinese automakers see opportunities in less mature electric vehicles because Western companies have yet to develop much of a lead in the technology.
column2: 作为国家刺激新能源汽车发展的一项激励措施，中国对石油进行补贴，而由于西方公司在技术方面尚未形成较大的领先优势，中国汽车制造商在不太成熟的电动汽车中看到了机会。

column1: In 2010, the company sold 2.72 million units, making it the second most-productive Chinese vehicle-maker.
column2: 2010 年，该公司售出 272 万辆车，成为中国第二大汽车生产商。

column1: It reported 1.72 million sales of passenger vehicles that same year.
column2: 该公司同一年报告销售了 172 万辆乘用车。

column1: 2011 production figures put the company in second place, in terms of production volume, in its home market; Dongfeng produced 3.06 million vehicles that year.
column2: 2011 年产量使该公司在国内市场产量方面位居第二；东风公司当年生产了 306 万辆汽车。

column1: It was the second-largest Chinese automaker in 2012 by production volume, and Dongfeng manufactured over 2.76 million whole vehicles that year with passenger cars comprising 73% of manufacture.
column2: 按产量计算，该公司为 2012 年中国第二大汽车制造商，东风当年生产超 276 万辆整车，其中乘用车占 73%。

column1: The number of cars counted as passenger vehicles may conflate consumer offerings and tiny commercial trucks and vans known as microvans, however.
column2: 但乘用车统计数量可能混淆了消费类产品和被称为微型面包车的小型商用卡车和面包车。

column1: Dongfeng established its first research and development facility outside of China in October 2012 when it acquired a 70 percent stake in the Swedish engineering company T Engineering AB.
column2: 2012 年 10 月，东风收购了瑞典工程公司 T Engineering AB 70% 的股权，建立了该公司首个海外研发基地。

column1: In December 2013, Dongfeng and the French automaker Renault agreed to form a 50:50 joint venture, Dongfeng Renault Automotive Co Ltd., to manufacture Renault brand passenger cars for the Chinese market.
column2: 2013 年 12 月，东风和法国汽车制造商雷诺集团同意按 50:50 的比例组建一家合资企业，即东风雷诺汽车有限公司，为中国市场生产雷诺品牌乘用车。

column1: The two partners agreed to invest an initial 7.76 billion yuan (US$1.27 billion) in the venture, which became Dongfeng's sixth joint venture with a foreign automaker—the most of any Chinese automaker.
column2: 双方同意向该合资企业初步投资 77.6 亿元人民币（12.7 亿美元），这也是东风与国外汽车厂商成立的第六家合资企业，数量为中国汽车制造商之最。

column1: In February 2014, loss making PSA Peugeot Citroën, a joint venture partner of Dongfeng since 1992, was recapitalized, with Dongfeng Motor Group taking a 14% stake.
column2: 东风的合资伙伴标致雪铁龙集团自 1992 年以来一直处于亏损状态，于 2014 年 2 月进行资本重组，东风汽车集团获得 14% 的股权。

column1: In 2017, it was announced that Dongfeng Motor Corporation would be re-incorporated as a limited company, renaming to 东风汽车集团有限公司, which only differ from its subsidiary Dongfeng Motor Group for the word 股份) (share).
column2: 2017 年，宣布东风汽车股份有限公司将重新注册为一家有限公司，更名为东风汽车集团有限公司，与子公司东风汽车集团的区别仅在于股份（share）一词。

column1: Dongfeng sells vehicles under various brand names.
column2: 东风销售各种品牌汽车。

column1: Other brands may be associated with products manufactured or assembled by joint-venture companies that see foreign firms cooperate with Dongfeng in order to gain access to the Chinese market.
column2: 其他品牌可能与合资公司生产或组装的产品有关，这些公司是外国公司与东风合作的产物，以获得进入中国市场的机会。

column1: Dongfeng Venucia Motor Company is a subsidiary of Dongfeng Motor Co., Ltd.
column2: 东风启辰汽车公司是东风汽车有限公司的一家子公司。

column1: established in 2017 and focused on the marketing and production of passenger cars.
column2: 成立于 2017 年，专注于乘用车的生产营销。

column1: The Venucia marque, launched in September 2010, was originally owned by Dongfeng Nissan Passenger Vehicle, itself another subsidiary of Dongfeng Motor Co., Ltd.
column2: 启辰品牌（Venucia）于 2010 年推出，最初由东风汽车有限公司的另一家子公司东风日产乘用车公司拥有。

column1: Launched in 2013, Fengdu (风度) is a sub-brand of Dongfeng Automobile started by producing out of production Nissan CUVs bearing the Dongfeng logo .
column2: 风度（Fengdu）于 2013 年推出，是东风汽车的一个子品牌，开始生产带东风标致的尼桑 CUV 车型。

column1: Older Nissan tooling was set up in China by Zhengzhou-Nissan to produce the second generation Nissan X-Trail rebadged as the Dongfeng Fengdu MX6.
column2: 较老的尼桑车型加工由郑州日产在中国建立，生产由第二代尼桑奇骏（X-Trail）改换车标而成的东风风度 MX6。

column1: 2009 saw the release of an own-brand sedan, the Fengshen S30, built with support from PSA Peugeot Citroën and in the same factories that produce its Peugeot and Citroën-branded products for the Chinese market.
column2: 2009 年发布了自主品牌轿车风神 S30，得到标致雪铁龙集团支持，在为中国市场生产标志和雪铁龙品牌产品的同一间工厂进行生产。

column1: The S30 may have been the first instance of Dongfeng selling private label passenger vehicles using its own "Dual Sparrows" logo in combination with its name.
column2: S30 可能是东风公司第一款在销售时使用自家的“双麻雀”标志外加公司名称的自有品牌乘用车。

column1: Own-brand Fengshen models include a hatchback as well, the Fengshen H30.
column2: 自主品牌的风神车型还包括一款掀背车，即风神 H30。

column1: Dongfeng Liuzhou Motor Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Dongfeng Motor Group, located in the city of Liuzhou, Guangxi, China.
column2: 东风柳州汽车有限公司是东风汽车集团的一家子公司，位于中国广西柳州市。

column1: Passenger vehicles produced by Dongfeng Liuzhou Motor bears the Dongfeng Fengxing brand and most products are based on older platforms from Mitsubishi and Nissan.
column2: 东风柳州汽车生产的乘用车挂东风风行品牌，大多数产品是在三菱和日产的旧平台上进行生产。

column1: Dongfeng is the Chinese partner in many joint ventures that make trucks and cars.
column2: 东风是制造卡车、汽车的许多合资企业的中方合作伙伴。

column1: Dongfeng established its joint venture with American parts-maker Dana Holding Corporation, Dongfeng Dana Axle Co, c. 2005.
column2: 2005年左右，东风与美国零部件制造商美国德纳公司成立了合资企业，即东风德纳车桥有限公司

column1: As of 2011, Dana and Dongfeng both have 50% ownership of this joint venture.
column2: 截至 2011 年，德纳和东风对该合资企业各拥有 50% 的所有权。

column1: Dongfeng DFSK (Sokon) or in Chinese Dongfeng Xiaokang (东风小康) is Sino-sino joint venture between Dongfeng and a local company, Chongqing Sokon Industry Group Co Ltd.
column2: 东风小康是东风公司与当地企业重庆小康工业集团有限公司成立的一家纯内资合资企业。

column1: Brands under the joint venture includes Dongfeng Sokon (DFSK, sometimes known as DF Dongfeng as the official website suggests) light commercial vehicles and Dongfeng Fengguang passenger vehicles.
column2: 合资企业旗下品牌包括轻型商用车东风小康（DFSK，有时也称为DF Dongfeng，如官方网站所示）和乘用车东风风光。

column1: Sokon also has its own electric startup brand based in North America called SF Motors.
column2: 小康股份在北美也有自己的电动汽车初创品牌，称为 SF Motors。

column1: In January 2013, Dongfeng and Volvo agreed to form a China-based medium- and heavy-duty truck manufacturing joint venture, Dongfeng Commercial Vehicles, with 55% ownership by Dongfeng Motor and 45% by Volvo.
column2: 2013 年 1 月，东风和沃尔沃同意组建一家位于中国的合资企业，即东东风商用车有限公司，生产中型及重型卡车，东风汽车持 55% 所有权，沃尔沃持 45%。

column1: As part of the transaction, Volvo will pay 5.6 billion yuan (US$900 million) to Dongfeng, which will pay Nissan Motors to replace it with Volvo in an existing commercial vehicle joint venture.
column2: 作为交易的一部分，沃尔沃将向东风支付 56 亿元人民币（9亿美元），后者将向日产汽车支付费用，以便在现有的商用车合资企业中用沃尔沃取代日产。

column1: It's unclear if the vehicles produced will be sold under the Volvo brand as a smaller, pre-existing Volvo-Dongfeng joint venture markets and assembles products with a "UD" brand and the Dongfeng brand name is traditionally used on commercial vehicles.
column2: 作为一家以“UD”品牌销售及组装产品的早已存在的沃尔沃-东风小规模合资企业，目前尚不清楚所生产车辆是否会以沃尔沃品牌进行销售，而东风品牌名称传统上是用于商用车。

column1: A Nissan joint venture engine production base in Shiyan, Hubei province, was producing diesel engines c. 2010, and it is possible this location was one asset of the former Nissan joint venture Dongfeng bought out as part of the Volvo deal.
column2: 位于湖北省十堰市的日产合资发动机生产基地在 2010 年左右生产柴油发动机，该基地可能是作为沃尔沃交易的一部分，由东风公司买下的前日产合资企业的一项资产。

column1: The company has the bland of Dongfeng Trucks.
column2: 该公司拥有东风卡车品牌。

column1: Based in Wuhan, Hubei province, Dongfeng Honda Automobile Company was established in 2003 and manufactures Honda-branded SUVs and automobiles for the Chinese market.
column2: 东风本田汽车有限公司位于湖北武汉，成立于 2003 年，为中国市场生产生产本田品牌的 SUV 及汽车。

column1: Products produced by this joint venture with Honda include the Honda Civic, the CR-V, and the Spirior.
column2: 这家与本田公司成立的合资企业，其生产的产品包括本田思域（Civic）、思威（CR-V）和思铂睿（Spirior）。

column1: As of early 2011, some offerings may incorporate Japanese-made parts.
column2: 截至2011年初，部分产品可能含有日本制造的零部件。

column1: In 2010, its model line included what was China's best-selling SUV that year, the CR-V.
column2: 2010年，其车型系列包括当年中国最畅销 SUV，即思威（CR-V）。

column1: Other Honda-branded models sold in China are made by Guangqi Honda Automobile, but a 2004 agreement allowed Dongfeng-built CR-Vs to be sold through Guangqi's showrooms.
column2: 在中国销售的其他本田品牌车型由广汽本田汽车有限公司制造，但2004年的一项协议允许通过广汽展厅销售由东风制造的思威（CR-V）。

column1: A China-only product line debuted in 2016 with the Gienia, a mid-size hatchback.
column2: 2016年，只在中国销售的产品线以一款中型掀背车竞瑞（Gienia）首次亮相。

column1: Primary production may be at its two Wuhan, Hubei, production sites, one of which became operational c. 2012.
column2: 主要生产可能位于该公司在湖北武汉的两个生产基地，其中一个已在 2012 年左右开始运营。

column1: Another plant produces engines for this joint venture in Guangzhou.
column2: 广州的另一家工厂为这家合资企业生产发动机。

column1: Nissan and Dongfeng have a long-standing relationship.
column2: 日产和东风有着长期的关系。

column1: Early on, the Chinese company produced diesel-powered Nissan trucks built from complete knock-down kits, and Nissan lent Dongfeng technical assistance.
column2: 在早期，这家中国公司用全散装料套件生产柴油动力的日产卡车，并由日产公司向东风提供技术援助。

column1: When the Chinese State began allowing foreign automakers market access through joint ventures, Nissan remained with Dongfeng.
column2: 当中国开始允许国外汽车制造商通过合资企业进入市场时，日产仍然与东风合作。

column1: It remains Nissan's only Chinese partner although each foreign automaker is allowed two.
column2: 尽管每家国外汽车制造商可以有两家合作伙伴，但该公司仍是日产唯一的中国合作方。

column1: As an example of the extensive and comprehensive nature of Nissan's technical assistance to the Chinese company, in 2011 nearly 70% of products Dongfeng manufactured were connected in some way to Nissan.
column2: 作为日产向中国公司提供技术援助之广、之全面的例子，2011 年，东风生产的产品中将近 70% 都与日产有某种关联。

column1: Established in 2002, Dongfeng Motor Co., Ltd (DFL) began operating in July 2003.
column2: 东风汽车有限公司（DFL）成立于 2002 年，2003 年 7 月开始运营。

column1: Nissan holds 50% ownership in this maker of heavy trucks, light commercial vehicles, and passenger cars.
column2: 日产对于这家重型卡车、轻型商用车和乘用车制造商持有 50% 的所有权。

column1: Heavy-duty trucks and buses exclusively carry the Dongfeng brand name, light-duty trucks use both the Nissan and Dongfeng names, and consumer offerings are Nissan products.
column2: 重型卡车和客车专属使用东风品牌，轻型卡车同时使用日产和东风品牌，消费类产品使用日产品牌。

column1: While the great majority of passenger cars retain the Nissan name, a small number sell under the brand name Venucia which is Dongfeng–Nissan's brand which offers cheaper products targeted at less-affluent inland city consumers.
column2: 尽管绝大多数乘用车保留了日产的名称，但有一小部分以“启辰”（Venucia）品牌进行销售，这是东风日产的品牌，为不太富裕的内陆城市消费者提供廉价产品。

column1: Venucia (Qi Chen) launched its first models in 2012.
column2: 启辰于 2012 年推出第一批车型。

column1: The name is derived from that of the Roman goddess of beauty, Venus.
column2: 这一名称取自罗马神话美神维纳斯（Venus）的名。。

column1: A few of its Dongfeng-branded light commercial vehicles have been exported to Afghanistan, Pakistan, Africa, and the Middle East.
column2: 该公司一些东风品牌的轻型商用车已出口至阿富汗、巴基斯坦、非洲及中东。

column1: Infiniti-branded vehicles are most probably imported as of 2006, but 2013 news stories suggested that some production would be moved to China in the future.
column2: 截至 2006 年，英菲尼迪品牌的汽车大多可能出自进口，但 2013 年的新闻报道表明，一部分生产将在今后转移到中国。

column1: Manufacture of the brand in China may have begun with the Q50L being produced at a site in Xiangyang sometime after 2014.
column2: 该品牌在中国的生产可能已经开始，Q50L 将于2014年之后某个时间在襄阳的一家工厂进行生产。

column1: Other joint ventures include Dongfeng Nissan Passenger Vehicle Co, a unit of Dongfeng Motor Company that makes automobiles for the domestic market and has exported to Egypt.
column2: 其他合资企业包括东风日产乘用车公司，该公司为东风汽车公司的一家单位，为国内市场生产汽车并出口至埃及。

column1: Another unit of Dongfeng Motor Co., Ltd., Zhengzhou Nissan Automobile Co, manufactures light commercial vehicles.
column2: 东风汽车有限公司的另一家单位，郑州日产汽车有限公司，生产轻型商用车。

column1: Most Zhengzhou products are sold under the Dongfeng brand, such as the Dongfeng Rich (Rui Qi), a reworked Nissan D22.
column2: 大多数郑州产品都以东风品牌销售，如东风锐骐，由尼桑 D22 改造而来。

column1: A passenger-car production base and technical center in Guangzhou, Guangdong, are part of both the Nissan joint venture Dongfeng Motor Co and a unit of that joint venture, Dongfeng Nissan Passenger Vehicle Co.
column2: 位于广东广州的乘用车生产基地和技术中心，是日产的合资企业东风汽车有限公司的一部分，也是合资企业东风日产乘用车公司的一家单位。

column1: Another Guangzhou production base manufactures Nissan engines.
column2: 广州的另一家生产基地生产日产发动机。

column1: As of 2009, a Nissan joint venture engine production base in Shiyan, Hubei province, produced diesel engines and other sites, auto parts.
column2: 截至 2009 年，位于湖北省十堰的一家日产合资发动机生产基地生产柴油发动机，而其他场地生产汽车零部件。

column1: It is possible this location has been shuttered and the tooling moved as Dongfeng bought out Nissan's stake in a joint venture company, Dongfeng Nissan Diesel Motor Co Ltd, as part of a deal to initiate a new joint venture with Volvo.
column2: 由于东风收购了日产在合资公司东风日产柴汽车有限公司的股权，作为与沃尔沃启动新合资企业的协议一部分，这个地方可能已经关闭，生产线转移已转移。

column1: In the Huadu District of Guangzhou, a production base was under construction in late 2010. Planned to have a 240,000 units/year production capacity, these may be engines not vehicles.
column2: 2010 年底，在广州花都区建设一个生产基地。计划拥有 24 万台/年的生产能力，可能生产发动机而不是汽车。

column1: It could be the large-scale vehicle production base under construction in 2010 that would expand Dongfeng-Nissan local production capacity in this area to 600,000 units/year.
column2: 这可能是 2010 年正在建设的大规模汽车生产基地，将使东风日产在这一地区的本地产能扩大至 60 万辆/年。

column1: A joint venture with Nissan has a production base, Zhengzhou Light Truck plant, in Zhengzhou, Henan.
column2: 日产的一家合资企业在河南郑州拥有一个生产基地，郑州轻型卡车厂。

column1: In 2010, this was joined by a second, increasing production capacity by 120,000 units/year.
column2: 2010 年又有了第 2 个，产能增至 12 万辆/年。

column1: Production capacity figures may consider engines and vehicles as discrete.
column2: 可以把发动机和车辆的产能数据看作不相关。

column1: A handful of Nissan joint venture production bases are located in Xiangfan, Hubei, making light commercial vehicles and cars.
column2: 少数的日产合资生产基地位于湖北襄樊，生产轻型商用车和轿车。

column1: Dong Feng Peugeot Citroën Automobile Company is a joint venture with PSA Peugeot-Citroën set up in 1992 and based in Wuhan, capital of Hubei province.
column2: 东风标致雪铁龙汽车公司是 1992 年与标致雪铁龙集团成立的一家合资企业， 设在湖北省会武汉。

column1: Currently selling a range of Peugeot and Citroën models, its first offering was a hatchback built from semi-complete knock-down kits, the ZX Fukang.
column2: 目前销售一系列标致及雪铁龙车型，首款产品是由半全散装料套件生产的掀背车，即 ZX 富康。

column1: Its first Peugeot-branded product was introduced in 2004.
column2: 其首款标志品牌产品于 2004 年推出。

column1: Some of the engines made by this joint venture are used in other Dongfeng passenger car products, the Fengshen S30 and H30, for example.
column2: 这家合资企业生产的部分发动机用于其他东风乘用车产品，例如风神 S30 和 H30。

column1: As of 2010, the PSA Peugeot Citroën joint venture had two production bases in Wuhan, and a third base for this joint venture was in the planning stages around 2010. Xiangfan serves as location for a powertrain production base for the joint venture with PSA Peugeot Citroën as of 2010.
column2: 截至 2010 年，标致雪铁龙的合资公司在武汉有两个生产基地，该公司第三个基地在 2010 年左右处于规划阶段。截至2010年，襄樊作为与标致雪铁龙的合资公司的动力总成生产基地所在地。

column1: An R&D center in Shanghai, the China Tech Center, is wholly owned by PSA Peugeot Citroën but lends assistance to the joint venture with this French automaker.
column2: 位于上海的研发中心即中国技术中心，由标致雪铁龙集团全资所有，但为这家法国汽车制造商的合资企业提供援助。

column1: Created in late 2013, Dongfeng Renault Automotive Co Ltd plans to produce 150,000 whole vehicles per year at an as-yet-unbuilt production base in China.
column2: 东风雷诺汽车有限公司创立于 2013 年底，在中国有一个尚未建成的生产基地，计划每年生产 15 万辆整车。

column1: This facility may become operational as early as 2016.
column2: 该设施可能最早于 2016 年投入运营。

column1: A joint venture with the Korean Kia Motors, Dongfeng Yueda Kia Automobile Co is based in Yancheng, Jiangsu province, and produces Kia-branded automobiles for the Chinese market.
column2: 与韩国起亚汽车的合资公司东风悦达起亚汽车有限公司位于江苏盐城，为中国市场生产起亚品牌汽车。

column1: Tu was born in Ningbo, Zhejiang, China, on 30 December 1930.
column2: 屠呦呦，1930 年 12 月 30 日出生于中国浙江宁波。

column1: My [first] name, Youyou, was given by my father, who adapted it from the sentence ‘呦呦鹿鸣, 食野之蒿’ translated as ‘Deer bleat “youyou” while they are eating the wild Hao’ in the Chinese Book of Odes.
column2: 我的名字“呦呦”是我父亲起的，他选自诗经中的诗句“悠悠鹿鸣，食野之蒿”，意思是鹿在吃野蒿的时候悠悠鸣叫。

column1: How this links my whole life with qinghao will probably remain an interesting coincidence forever.
column2: 这如何把我的一生与青蒿联系起来，可能永远都是一个有趣的巧合。

column1: — Tu Youyou, when interviewed in 2011 after being awarded the 2011 Lasker-DeBakey Clinical Medical Research Award
column2: —— 屠呦呦获得 2011 年拉斯克-狄贝基临床医学研究奖后于 2011 年接受采访

column1: She attended Xiaoshi Middle School for junior high school and the first year of high school, before transferring to Ningbo Middle School in 1948.
column2: 她在效实中学读完初中和高中一年级后，于 1948 年转学到宁波中学。

column1: A tuberculosis infection interrupted her high-school education, but inspired her to go into medical research.
column2: 一次肺结核感染中断了她的高中求学，但却激励她进入医学研究领域。

column1: From 1951 to 1955, she attended Peking University Medical School / Beijing Medical College.
column2: 1951 年至 1955 年，她就读于北京大学医学院/北京医学院。

column1: In 1955, Youyou Tu graduated from Beijing Medical University School of Pharmacy and continued her research on Chinese herbal medicine in the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences.
column2: 1955 年，屠呦呦毕业于北京医科大学药学院，在中国中医科学院继续从事中药研究。

column1: Tu studied at the Department of Pharmaceutical Sciences, and graduated in 1955.
column2: 屠呦呦就读于药学系，于 1955 年毕业。

column1: Later Tu was trained for two and a half years in traditional Chinese medicine.
column2: 后来，屠呦呦接受了两年半的中医药培训。

column1: After graduation, Tu worked at the Academy of Traditional Chinese Medicine (now the China Academy of Traditional Chinese Medical Sciences) in Beijing.
column2: 毕业后，屠呦呦在北京的中医研究院（现中国中医科学院）工作。

column1: Tu and her husband, Li Tingzhao (李廷钊), a metallurgical engineer, live in Beijing.
column2: 屠呦呦和她的丈夫李廷钊住在北京，李廷钊是一名冶金工程师。

column1: Li was Tu's classmate at Xiaoshi Middle School.
column2: 李廷钊是屠呦呦在效实中学的同学。

column1: They have two daughters.
column2: 他们育有两个女儿。

column1: Tu's maternal grandfather, Yao Yongbai (姚咏白), was the first Director of National Treasury Administration after its reform.
column2: 屠呦呦的外祖父姚咏白曾担任中华民国国库改革后的首任国库司司长。

column1: Her uncle, Yao Qingsan (姚庆三), was an economist and banker.
column2: 她的舅舅姚庆三是一位经济学家、银行家。

column1: Tu carried on her work in the 1960s and 70s during China's Cultural Revolution, when scientists were denigrated as one of the nine black categories in society according to Maoist theory (or possibly that of the Gang of Four).
column2: 在中国文化大革命期间，屠呦呦在 20 世纪 60 年代和 70 年代继续自己的工作，当时按照毛泽东的理论（也可能是四人帮的理论），科学家被污蔑为社会上的“黑九类”之一。

column1: During her early years in research, Tu studied Lobelia chinensis, a traditional Chinese medicine for curing schistosomiasis, caused by trematodes which infect the urinary tract or the intestines, which was widespread in the first half of the 20th century in South China.
column2: 在她早年的研究中，她对一种治疗血吸虫病的传统中药半边莲进行了研究，血吸虫病由血吸虫引起，感染尿路或肠道，20 世纪上半叶曾在中国南方大面积流行。

column1: In 1967, during the Vietnam War, Ho Chi Minh, the leader of North Vietnam (which was at war against South Vietnam and the United States), asked Chinese Premier Zhou Enlai for help in developing a malaria treatment for his soldiers trooping down the Ho Chi Minh trail, where a majority came down with a form of malaria which is resistant to chloroquine.
column2: 1967 年越战期间，北越（当时与南越和美国交战）领导人胡志明请求中国总理周恩来帮助开发一种疟疾治疗方法，其手下士兵在胡志明小道上行军时，其中大多数人都患上了一种对氯喹有抗药性的疟疾。

column1: Because malaria was also a major cause of death in China's southern provinces, including Hainan, Yunnan, Guangxi, and Guangdong, Zhou Enlai convinced Mao Zedong to set up a secret drug discovery project named Project 523 after its starting date, 23 May 1967.
column2: 由于疟疾也是海南、云南、广西和广东等中国南方省份的一大死亡原因，周恩来说服毛泽东成立了一个秘密的药物研发项目，以其开始日期 1967 年 5 月 23 日定名为 “523 项目”。

column1: In early 1969, Tu was appointed head of the Project 523 research group at her institute.
column2: 1969 年初，屠呦呦被任命为她所在研究所的 523 项目研究组组长。

column1: Tu was initially sent to Hainan where she studied patients who had been infected with the disease.
column2: 屠呦呦最初被派往海南，她在那里对感染了这种疾病的病人开展研究。

column1: Scientists worldwide had screened over 240,000 compounds without success.
column2: 全世界的科学家已经筛选了超过 24 万种化合物，但没有成功。

column1: In 1969, Tu, then 39 years old, had an idea of screening Chinese herbs.
column2: 1969 年，屠呦呦当时 39 岁，她产生了筛选中草药的想法。

column1: She first investigated the Chinese medical classics in history, visiting practitioners of traditional Chinese medicine all over the country on her own.
column2: 她先研究了历史上的中医经典，独自拜访了全国各地的中医。

column1: She gathered her findings in a notebook called A Collection of Single Practical Prescriptions for Anti-Malaria.
column2: 她把自己的发现整理成一本笔记，名为《抗虐单验方集》。

column1: Her notebook summarized 640 prescriptions.
column2: 她的笔记总结了 640 份处方。

column1: By 1971, her team had screened over 2,000 traditional Chinese recipes and made 380 herbal extracts, from some 200 herbs, which were tested on mice.
column2: 到 1971 年，她的团队已筛选 2000 多个中国传统配方，并从大约 200 种草药中提取了 380 种草药提取物，在小鼠身上进行试验。

column1: One compound was effective, sweet wormwood (Artemisia annua), which was used for "intermittent fevers," a hallmark of malaria.
column2: 有一种化合物很有效，就是黄花蒿（Artemisia annua），被用来治疗作为疟疾标志的“间歇性发烧”。

column1: As Tu also presented at the project seminar, its preparation was described in a 1,600-year-old text, in a recipe titled, "Emergency Prescriptions Kept Up One's Sleeve".
column2: 正如屠呦呦在项目研讨会上所介绍的，该药的制备方法在一本题为《肘后备急方的》医书中有所记载，该书已有 1600 年历史。

column1: At first, it was ineffective because they extracted it with traditional boiling water.
column2: 起初并没有效果，因为他们采用传统的沸水来提取该物质。

column1: Tu Youyou discovered that a low-temperature extraction process could be used to isolate an effective antimalarial substance from the plant; Tu says she was influenced by a traditional Chinese herbal medicine source, The Handbook of Prescriptions for Emergency Treatments, written in 340 by Ge Hong, which states that this herb should be steeped in cold water.
column2: 屠呦呦发现，可采用低温提取工艺从该植物中分离出一种有效的抗疟物质；屠呦呦表示，自己受传统中医资料《肘后备急方》的影响，此书由葛洪写于公元 340 年，书中写明这种草药应当冷水浸泡。

column1: This book contained the direction to immerse a handful of qinghao in the equivalent of two litres of water, wring out the juice and drink it all.
column2: 这本书中所写的方法是将一把青蒿浸泡在两升水中，绞出汁液并全部喝下。

column1: After rereading the recipe, Tu realised the hot water had already damaged the active ingredient in the plant; therefore she proposed a method using low-temperature ether to extract the effective compound instead.
column2: 重读药方之后，屠呦呦意识到热水已经破坏了植物中的有效成分，因此她提出一种使用低温乙醚来提取有效化合物的方法。

column1: The animal tests showed it was completely effective in mice and monkeys.
column2: 动物实验表明，其对于小鼠和猴子完全有效。

column1: In 1972, she and her colleagues obtained the pure substance and named it qinghaosu (青蒿素), or artemisinin as it is commonly called in the West, which has saved millions of lives, especially in the developing world.
column2: 1972 年，她和她的同事得到了这种纯净物，将其命名为青蒿素，即西方通常所说的黄花蒿素，它拯救了数百万人的生命，尤其是在发展中国家。

column1: Tu also studied the chemical structure and pharmacology of artemisinin.
column2: 屠呦呦还研究了青蒿素的化学结构和药理学。

column1: Tu's group first determined the chemical structure of artemisinin.
column2: 屠呦呦的小组第一个确定了青蒿素的化学结构。

column1: In 1973, Tu wanted to confirm the carbonyl group in the artemisinin molecule, therefore she accidentally synthesized dihydroartemisinin.
column2: 1973 年，屠呦呦想确认青蒿素分子中的羰基，因此意外合成了双氢青蒿素。

column1: Furthermore, Tu volunteered to be the first human subject.
column2: 此外，屠呦呦还自愿成为第一个人类受试者。

column1: As head of this research group, I had the responsibility she said.
column2: 她说，“作为这个研究小组的负责人，我有责任。”

column1: It was safe, so she conducted successful clinical trials with human patients.
column2: 药物很安全，因此她在人类病人身上进行了临床试验，取得成功。

column1: Her work was published anonymously in 1977.
column2: 她的成果于 1977 年匿名发表。

column1: In 1981, she presented the findings relating to artemisinin at a meeting with the World Health Organization.
column2: 1981 年，她在世界卫生组织的一次会议上介绍了与青蒿素有关的研究结果。

column1: For her work on malaria, she was awarded the Nobel Prize in Medicine on 5 October 2015.
column2: 由于她在疟疾方面的工作，她于 2015 年 10 月 5 日被授予诺贝尔医学奖。

column1: She was promoted to a Researcher (研究员, the highest researcher rank in mainland China equivalent to the academic rank of a full professor) in 1980 shortly after the Chinese economic reform began in 1978.
column2: 在 1978 年中国经济改革开始后不久，她于 1980 年被提拔为研究员（中国大陆最高的研究员等级，学术级别相当于正教授）。

column1: In 2001 she was promoted to academic advisor for doctoral candidates.
column2: 2001 年，她被提拔为博士生学术导师。

column1: Currently she is the Chief Scientist in the Academy.
column2: 目前她担任学院首席科学家。

column1: As of 2007, her office is in an old apartment building in Dongcheng District, Beijing.
column2: 截至 2007 年，她的办公室位于北京东城区一幢旧公寓楼里。

column1: Before 2011, Tu Youyou had been obscure for decades, and is described as "almost completely forgotten by people".
column2: 2011 年之前，屠呦呦默默无闻了几十年，被形容为“几乎被人完全忘记”。

column1: Tu is regarded as the "Three-Without Scientist" – no postgraduate degree (there was no postgraduate education then in China), no study or research experience abroad, and not a member of either the Chinese national academies, the Chinese Academy of Sciences and Chinese Academy of Engineering.
column2: 屠呦呦被认为是“三无科学家”——无研究生学位（中国当时没有研究生教育），无海外学习或研究经历，也不是任何一家中国国家科学院即中国科学院和中国工程院的院士。

column1: Tu is now regarded as a representative figure of the first generation of Chinese medical workers since the establishment of the People's Republic of China in 1949.
column2: 屠呦呦现在被认为是 1949 年中华人民共和国成立以来，第一代中国医务工作者的代表人物。

column1: National Taiwan University has its origins in the 臺北帝國大學 Taihoku Imperial University (Taihoku Teikoku Daigaku), founded in 1928 during Japanese rule as a member of the imperial university system administered by the Empire of Japan.
column2: 国立台湾大学起源于 1928 年日据时期成立的台北帝国大学，作为日本帝国所管理的帝国大学体系的一部分。

column1: The school's first president was Taira Shidehara.
column2: 该校首任校长为币元坦。

column1: The Taihoku Imperial University began with a Faculty of Liberal Arts and Law and a Faculty of Science and Agriculture serving 60 students.
column2: 台北帝国大学起初设有文政学部和理农学部，学生 60 人。

column1: The University was intended mainly for Japanese nationals; few Taiwanese students were admitted.
column2: 该校主要面向日本国民；很少台湾学生被录取。

column1: The Faculty of Medicine and the Faculty of Engineering were added in 1935 and 1943, respectively.
column2: 分别于 1935 年和 1943 年增设医学部和工学部。

column1: After World War II, the Republic of China (Taiwan) government reorganized the school as an institution for Chinese-speaking students.
column2: 二战后，中华民国（台湾）政府将该校改组为招收中国学生的机构。

column1: The school was renamed National Taiwan University on 15 November 1945 and Lo Tsung-lo was appointed as its president.
column2: 该校于 1945 年 11 月 15 日改名为国立台湾大学，罗宗洛任校长。

column1: The Literature and Politics division was divided into the College of Liberal Arts and the College of Law.
column2: 文政学部划分为文学院和法学院。

column1: Additionally, colleges of Science, Medicine, Engineering, and Agriculture were established.
column2: 此外，还成立了理、医、工、农学院。

column1: Initially, there were six colleges with 22 departments.
column2: 最初有六个学院，22 个学系。

column1: In 1945, student enrollment was 585.
column2: 1945 年，学生入学人数为 585 人。

column1: In 1960, the night school was initiated on a trial basis, and in 1967 a new night school was established.
column2: 1960 年开始试办夜校，1967年新成立一所夜校。

column1: In 1987, the College of Management was established, followed by the College of Public Health in 1993 and the College of Electrical Engineering in 1997.
column2: 1987 年成立管理学院，随后于 1993 年成立公共卫生学院，1997 年成立电机学院。

column1: The College of Electrical Engineering was later reorganized as the College of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering.
column2: 电气工程学院后来改组为电机资讯学院。

column1: In 1999, the College of Law has renamed the College of Social Sciences, and the Night Division and the Center for Continuing Education were combined to form the School for Professional and Continuing Studies.
column2: 1999 年，法学院改名为社会科学院，夜间部和继续教育中心合并组建进修推广学院。

column1: In 2002, the College of Agriculture has renamed the College of Bio-resources and Agriculture, and in 2002 a College of Life Sciences was added.
column2: 2002 年，农学院更名为生物资源暨农学院，并于 2002 年增设生命科学院。

column1: The University has 11 colleges, with 56 departments and 112 graduate institutes, plus over 50 national and university-level research centers.
column2: 学校有 11 个学院、56 个学系和 112 个研究所，还有 50 多个国家级和校级研究中心。

column1: The total number of students, including those enrolled at the School of Professional and Continuing Studies, has grown to over 33,000, including over 17,000 university students and 15,000 graduate students.
column2: 包括进修推广学院在册学生在内的学生总数已增长到 33000 多人，其中包括 17000 多名大学生和 15000 名研究生。

column1: The president heads the University.
column2: 该大学由校长领导。

column1: Each college is headed by a dean and each department by a chairman.
column2: 各学院由一名院长领导，各学系由一名系主任领导。

column1: Students elect their own representatives each year to attend administrative meetings.
column2: 学生每年选出自己的代表参加行政会议。

column1: Kuan Chung-ming was named university president-elect in January 2018 but soon became embroiled in scandals related to plagiarism, academic misconduct, and violations of civil code stipulating that Taiwanese public servants were not permitted to deliver lectures or to be involved in any mainland China-related academic domain due to Taiwanese security concerns.
column2: 管中闵于 2018 年 1 月被任命为大学遴选校长，但不久就陷入与抄袭、学术不端以及违反民法规定的丑闻之中，民法规定出于台湾的安全考虑，台湾公务员不得举行讲座或参与任何与中国大陆有关的学术领域。

column1: Tei-Wei Kuo is serving as the interim president of the university while the appointment of the president-elect is undergoing legal investigation.
column2: 在遴选校长的任命接受法律调查期间，郭大维担任该校临时校长。

column1: On January 2019, Kuan Chung-ming has been officially named as the university president.
column2: 2019 年 1 月，管中闵被正式任命为大学校长。

column1: The University comprises 11 colleges: Liberal Arts, Engineering, Science, Social Sciences, Law, Bio-Resources & Agriculture, Management, Public Health, Electrical Engineering & Computer Science, Medicine, and Life Science.
column2: 大学包括 11 个学院：文学院、工学院、理学院、社会科学院、法学院、生物资源暨农学院、管理学院、公共卫生学院、电机资讯学院、医学院和生命科学院。

column1: NTU offers bachelor's degrees, master's degrees, and doctorate degrees in many disciplines.
column2: 台大授予许多学科的学士、硕士和博士学位。

column1: NTU requires most of its undergraduate students to take a mandatory core curriculum, comprising Chinese, freshman English, physical education, and public service.
column2: 台大要求其大多数本科生学习必修的核心课程，包括国语、大一英语、体育和公共服务。

column1: The medical school in addition dictates each of its students to take philosophy and sociology classes as well as seminars in ethics and thanatology.
column2: 此外，医学院还规定每个学生都要上哲学课和社会科学课，还要参加伦理学和动物学的研讨会。

column1: Military training is no longer an obligatory course for male students, but it is a prerequisite if they plan to apply to become officers during their compulsory military service.
column2: 军训不再是男生的必修课，但如果他们打算在义务兵役期间申请成为军官，则军训是先决条件。

column1: NTU's programs cover a wide array of disciplines across science, arts, and the humanities, with up to 8,000 courses made available for selection each semester.
column2: 台大的课程涵盖了科学、艺术和人文等众多学科，每学期有多达 8000 门课程可供选择。

column1: Students are able to select courses offered by any of the colleges; however, compulsory subjects designated for each major needs to be completed to be awarded a degree.
column2: 学生可以选择任何一个学院开设的课程；但必须完成每个专业指定的必修课才能获得学位。

column1: A student must declare a major during college application, some majors are more competitive than others and require a higher national examination score.
column2: 学生在大学入学申请期间必须申报专业，有些专业比其他专业更具竞争力，需要更高的联考分数。

column1: In recent years, medicine, electrical engineering, law, and finance have been the most selective majors.
column2: 近年来，医学、电子工程、法律和金融是最多人选择的专业。

column1: Most majors take four years to complete while the dental and the medical degree take six and seven years to finish, respectively.
column2: 大多数专业需要四年才能读完，而牙科和医学学位则分别需要六年和七年时间才能读完。

column1: The International Chinese Language Program (ICLP), founded by Stanford University, is located at National Taiwan University.
column2: 由斯坦福大学创办的国际华语研习所（ICLP）位于国立台湾大学。

column1: NTU is a member of the Association of Pacific Rim Universities, Washington University in St. Louis’s McDonnell International Scholars Academy, and the Association of East Asian Research Universities.
column2: 台大是环太平洋大学联盟、美国圣路易斯华盛顿大学麦道国际学者学会和东亚研究型大学协会的成员。

column1: NTU also participates in several programs of the Taiwan International Graduate Program of Academia Sinica, Taiwan's most preeminent academic research institution.
column2: 台大还参加了台湾最杰出的学术研究机构，即中央研究院的台湾国际研究生学程等多个项目。

column1: NTU has produced many notable alumni.
column2: 台大培养了许多著名校友。

column1: Tsai Ing-Wen, the current President of the Republic of China (Taiwan), as well as former presidents Lee Teng-hui, Chen Shui-bian and Ma Ying-jeou, all graduated from NTU.
column2: 中华民国（台湾）现任“总统”蔡英文，以及前“总统”李登辉、陈水扁和马英九，均毕业于台大。

column1: Both Nobel Prize in Chemistry laureate Yuan T. Lee and Turing Award laureate Andrew Yao received their Bachelor of Science from the University.
column2: 诺贝尔化学奖获得者李远哲和图灵奖获得者姚期智都在该校获得理学士学位。

column1: Many NTU electrical engineering graduates have gone on to build global companies, including Quanta Computer's Barry Lam, Mediatek's Tsai Ming-kai and Garmin's Min Kao.
column2: 许多台大电机专业的毕业生后来都建立了全球性的公司，包括广达电脑的林百里、联发科的蔡明介和佳明的高民环。

column1: Zhang Peng changed his art from painting to photography in 2006.
column2: 2006 年，张鹏将自己的艺术从绘画改为摄影。

column1: When asked why he converted to photography, the artist replied, "There is no special reason.
column2: 当被问及为何改做摄影时，这位艺术家回答说："没什么特别的原因。

column1: When I changed my genre from painting to photography, many people were just like you.
column2: 当我把体裁从绘画改成摄影时，许多人跟你一样。

column1: They were curious as to why I changed my media so suddenly and kept asking me why.
column2: 他们很好奇我为什么突然改变形式，不断追问我原因。

column1: However, all I wanted was to express many thoughts and emotions in my mind through more diversified means." He feels that photography can capture the moment of an event, while painting offers only a limited time to express all of ones thoughts.
column2: 但是，我想要的只是通过更多样化的手段来表达我内心的诸多想法和情感。”他认为摄影能够捕捉事件的瞬间，而绘画只能提供有限的时间来表达一个人的全部想法。

column1: He makes flawless compositions, carefully arranged as theater sets and elaborately controls the lighting effects to create dramatic scenes.
column2: 他做出完美无缺的构图，像剧院布景一样细心安排，并精心控制灯光效果，以打造戏剧性的场景。

column1: Computer manipulations are also used to make abnormally big eyes and slender bodies.
column2: 还使用电脑操作来制造大得出奇的眼睛和纤细的身躯。

column1: The red used in Zhang Peng's paintings and full-color photographs symbolize "either China itself or blood.
column2: 张鹏的绘画和全彩照片中所用的红色象征“中国本身或血液。

column1: As the national economy grows, each individual within it becomes relatively small.
column2: 随着国民经济增长，其中每个人都变得相对较小。

column1: Red implies the meaning of this duality." He doesn't use red in his recent black-and-white photographs, but the omission of it seems to add brutality and subtlety to those pieces.
column2: 红色暗含这种双重性的意义。”他在近期的黑白照片中并未使用红色，但少了红色似乎为这些作品更添一分残酷和微妙。

column1: Zhang Peng is determined and serious about his art.
column2: 张鹏对自己的艺术坚定而认真。

column1: His works are different from the works of other artists of his age.
column2: 他的作品与和他同时代的其他艺术家的作品不一样。

column1: The young artists of China born after 1980 grew up in relatively stable social circumstances after China's Cultural Revolution.
column2: 1980 年之后出生的中国年轻艺术家们成长于中国文化大革命之后相对稳定的社会环境。

column1: However, they were still strongly influenced by their older generations. "The memory and influence of my family background and school education build the foundation of my art.
column2: 但他们仍受到老一辈的深刻影响。“对于我家庭背景和学校教育的记忆及影响，给我的艺术奠定了基础。

column1: My parents and schools were influenced by politics,” said Zhang Peng.
column2: 我的父母和学校都受到政治影响。”张鹏说。

column1: He describes his growth as happening in between the sudden advent of the market economy and the long tradition of socialism, which is as awkward as wearing clothing that does not fit.
column2: 他把自己的成长描述为发生在横空出世的市场经济和长期的社会主义传统之间，就像穿着不合身的衣服一样尴尬。

column1: Zhang Peng's art conveys serious contemplation of his surroundings and the society in a way that is not found in the arts of other Chinese artists born after 1980.
column2: 张鹏的作品传达出他对周围环境和社会的严肃思考，这在 1980 年之后出生的其他中国艺术家的作品中是没有的。

column1: All of the young girls in Zhang Peng's artworks are delicate and helpless.
column2: 张鹏艺术作品中所有的年轻女孩都是娇弱无助的。

column1: Their big, sad eyes are filled with tears and seem to appeal to the audience.
column2: 她们悲伤的大眼睛里充满泪水，好似在吸引观众。

column1: “Their indescribable expressions of hurt and vulnerability leave the viewer unsettled, disconcerted and heavy hearted.” His intentions are to create a visual contradiction that represents the current problems in China due to the ever-growing modernization.
column2: “他们那种无法描述的关于伤害和脆弱的表情令观众感到不安，不知所措，心情沉重。”他的意图是创造一种视觉矛盾，代表中国目前由于不断发展的现代化而产生的问题。

column1: One of those problems is the gross overpopulation of the country.
column2: 其中一个问题是国家人口严重过剩。

column1: Because of the one-child policy, families are being selective about the gender of their babies.
column2: 由于独生子女政策，家庭对婴儿性别有所选择。

column1: Boys have traditionally been more desired.
column2: 男孩历来更受青睐。

column1: In order to ensure the birth of boy, families resort to a number of different methods, including having early-term abortions with the discovery of a girl fetus.
column2: 为了确保生男孩，家家户户采取许多不同的方法，包括在发现胎儿是女孩时进行孕早期流产。

column1: Because of this, China now has the greatest difference in sex ratio, with males outnumbering females by 35 million (Timeinmoments.com, 1).
column2: 正因如此，中国目前的性别比例差距最大，男性比女性多出 3500 万（Timeinmoments.com，1）。

column1: Zhang Peng’s image of girl dolls symbolizes the discrimination against young girls in China and the injustices they endure.
column2: 张鹏的女娃娃形象象征着中国年轻女孩儿受到的歧视和她们所承受的不公。

column1: Hainan Airlines was established in October 1989 as Hainan Province Airlines in Hainan, the largest special economic zone in China.
column2: 海南航空于 1989 年 10 月在中国最大的经济特区海南成立，名为海南省航空公司。

column1: Hainan Province Airlines became China's first joint-stock air-transport company following a restructuring in January 1993 and began scheduled services on 2 May 1993.
column2: 海南省航空公司在 1993 年 1 月重组后，成为中国第一家股份制航空运输公司，并于 1993 年 5 月 2 日开始提供定期航班服务。

column1: The initial 250 million yuan (US$31.25 million) was financed by the Hainan government (5.33%) and the corporate staff (20%).
column2: 最初的 2.5 亿元人民币（3125 万美元）由海南省政府（5.33%）和企业员工（20%）出资。

column1: The rest came from institutional shareholders.
column2: 其余来自机构股东。

column1: In 1996, the provincial airline was renamed Hainan Airlines.
column2: 1996 年，这家省级航空公司更名为海南航空公司。

column1: American Aviation LLC, controlled by George Soros, had been a major shareholder of the airline since 1995.
column2: 乔治·索罗斯控制的 American Aviation LLC 公司自 1995 年以来始终是该公司大股东。

column1: Executive-jet operations with a Bombardier Learjet 55 were added in April 1995.
column2: 1995 年 4 月，增加了由庞巴迪里尔 55 型飞机执飞的公务机业务。

column1: In 1998, Hainan Airlines became the first Chinese carrier to own shares in an airport after it purchased 25% stake of Haikou Meilan International Airport.
column2: 1998 年，海南航空买入海口美兰国际机场 25% 的股份，成为中国第一家拥有机场股份的航空公司。

column1: In 2000, HNA Group was established and became the third largest shareholder (7.31%) of Hainan Airlines.
column2: 2000 年，海航集团成立，成为海南航空的第三大股东（7.31%）。

column1: It also controlled Shanxi Airlines, Chang An Airlines and China Xinhua Airlines.
column2: 还控股山西航空、长安航空和中国新华航空。

column1: By 2003 Hainan, the main airline, overtook Chang'an as the fourth largest airline in China.
column2: 到 2003 年，主航空公司海南航空超过长安航空，成为中国第四大航空公司。

column1: In 2007 Grand China Air was established as the new holding company, when American Aviation became its subsidiary.
column2: 2007 年，新的控股公司大新华航空成立，当时 American Aviation 成为其子公司。

column1: On 29 September 2005, HNA Group ordered 42 Boeing 787-8s, 10 of which were earmarked for the Hainan Airlines fleet.
column2: 2005 年 9 月 29 日，海航集团订购了 42 架波音 787-8 飞机，其中 10 架指定用于海南航空机队。

column1: In January 2006, China Aviation Supplies Import and Export Group Corporation ordered 10 Boeing 737-800s for Hainan Airlines.
column2: 2006 年 1 月，中国航空物资进出口集团公司为海南航空订购了 10 架波音 737-800 飞机。

column1: In September 2006, Hainan Airlines ordered another 15 Boeing 737-800s.
column2: 2006 年 9 月，海南航空又订购了 15 架波音 737-800 飞机。

column1: On 4 December 2007, Hainan Airlines acquired three Airbus A340-600s on lease from International Lease Finance Corporation.
column2: 2007 年 12 月 4 日，海南航空向国际租赁金融公司租了三架空客 A340-600 飞机。

column1: On 14 November 2007, Hainan Airlines received its first Airbus A330-200.
column2: 2007 年 11 月 14 日，海南航空收到其首架空客 A330-200 飞机。

column1: In June 2007, Hainan Airlines ordered 13 Airbus A320-200 aircraft.
column2: 2007 年 6 月，海南航空订购 13 架空客 A320-200 飞机。

column1: In late 2007, Hainan Airlines ordered 50 Embraer ERJ-145s and 50 Embraer 190s, with a total value (at list price) of US$2.7 billion.
column2: 2007 年底，海南航空订购了 50 架 Embraer ERJ-145 飞机和 50 架 Embraer 190 飞机，总价值（按清单价格）27 亿美元。

column1: The 50-seat ERJ-145s were produced by the Harbin Embraer Aircraft Industry (HEAI) joint venture, located in Harbin.
column2: 50 座的 ERJ-145 飞机由位于哈尔滨的合资企业哈尔滨安博威飞机工业有限公司生产。

column1: E-190 deliveries began in December 2007. Due to the global financial crisis and huge losses incurred in 2008, the ERJ-145 order was reduced to 25.
column2: E-190 于 2007 年 12 月开始交付。由于全球金融危机和 2008 年巨额亏损，ERJ-145 订单减少至 25 架。

column1: The E-190 order remained unchanged.
column2: E-190 订单保持不变。

column1: On 25 March 2015, Hainan Airlines announced its intention to acquire 30 Boeing 787-9s, which are all to join the Hainan Airlines Fleet.
column2: 2015 年 3 月 25 日，海南航空宣布其有意购买 30 架波音 787-9 飞机，这些飞机将全部加入海南航空机队。

column1: The delivery of the aircraft is scheduled to be completed by 2021.
column2: 飞机交付计划于 2021 年完成。

column1: Two leased Boeing 787-9 aircraft were delivered in Spring 2016.
column2: 两架租赁的波音 787-9 飞机已于 2016 年春交付。

column1: Hainan Airlines will also be among the first operators of the COMAC C919, with deliveries beginning in the 2020s.
column2: 海南航空也将成为中国商飞 C919 飞机的首批运营商之一，将于二〇二几年开始交付。

column1: Hainan Airlines and the HNA Group have their headquarters in the HNA Building (simplified Chinese: 新海航大厦; traditional Chinese: 新海航大廈; pinyin: Xīn Hǎiháng Dàshà), in Haikou, Hainan.
column2: 海南航空和海航集团的总部位于海南省海口市新海航大厦。

column1: with other office premises HNA Tower in focused cities including Beijing, Chongqing, Guangzhou, and Shanghai.
column2: 在北京、重庆、广州和上海等重点城市均有其他海航大厦作为办公场所。

column1: It was previously headquartered in the HNA Development Building a.k.a. the Haihang Development Building (simplified Chinese: 海航发展大厦; traditional Chinese: 海航發展大廈; pinyin: Hǎiháng Fāzhǎn Dàshà) along Haixiu Road in Haikou.
column2: 以前的总部位于海口市海秀路上的海航发展大厦。

column1: As of 31 December 2016, the Hainan provincial government owns 53.67% of Hainan Airlines' shares through Grand China Air Holding Company, which is controlled by the investment arm of the Hainan government.
column2: 截至 2016 年 12 月 31 日，海南省政府通过大新华航空控股有限公司持有海南航空 53.67% 的股份，大新华航空由海南省政府的投资部门控股。

column1: Grand China Air is the direct parent company of Hainan Airlines (24.33% shares directly; an additional 1.29% shares via a subsidiary American Aviation LDC), which was partially owned by Hainan Development Holdings (24.97%), HNA Group (23.11%), Starstep (9.57%), Haikou Meilan International Airport (8.30%), Shenhua Group (5.56%) and other shareholders (As of 30 June 2016).
column2: 大新华航空是海南航空的直接母公司（直接持股 24.33%；另通过子公司 American Aviation LDC 持股 1.29%），由海南省发展控股有限公司（24.97%）、海航集团（23.11%）、Starstep（9.57%）、海口美兰国际机场（8.30%）、神华集团（5.56%）和其他股东部分持有（截至 2016 年 6 月 30 日）。

column1: HNA Group owned 3.53% shares directly and via Changjiang Leasing, owned an additional 3.08% shares as the second largest shareholder.
column2: 海航集团直接持有 3.53% 的股份，并通过长江租赁持有另 3.08% 的股份，是第二大股东。

column1: Haikou Meilan International Airport was the third largest shareholder for 5.13% shares.
column2: 海口美兰国际机场为第三大股东，占 5.13% 的股份。

column1: Moreover, HNA Group also owned Haikou Meilan International Airport partially, as well as Hainan Airlines as cross ownership.
column2: 此外，海航集团还部分拥有海口美兰国际机场和海南航空的交叉所有权。

column1: A private equity fund that was managed by Shanghai Pudong Development Bank, owned 4.91% shares as the fourth largest shareholder.
column2: 由上海浦东发展银行管理的一家私募股权基金持有 4.91% 的股份，为第四大股东。

column1: Hainan Airlines operates several self-owned airport lounges at its main hub and focus cities including Beijing (T1 HNA Exclusive Terminal), Haikou, Xi'an, Guangzhou, and Urumqi.
column2: 海南航空在其主要枢纽和重点城市运营多个自有机场休息室，包括北京（T1 海航专属航站楼）、海口、西安、广州和乌鲁木齐。

column1: In addition, the airline will soon open its exclusive international departure lounge at its main international hub Beijing International Airport Terminal 2.
column2: 此外，该航空公司即将在其主要国际枢纽北京国际机场 2 号航站楼开设专属的国际出发休息室。

column1: The airline also operates an exclusive Transit Lounge for transferring HNA Group passengers at Beijing Airport Non-restricted area.
column2: 该航空公司还在北京机场非限制区，为海航集团的转机旅客开设了专属的中转休息室。

column1: Hainan Airlines's frequent-flyer program is called Fortune Wings Club (simplified Chinese: 金鹏俱乐部; traditional Chinese: 金鵬俱樂部; pinyin: Jīn Péng Jùlèbù).
column2: 海南航空的常旅客计划称为“金鹏俱乐部”。

column1: The airlines's subsidiaries Hong Kong Airlines, Lucky Air, Tianjin Airlines, Beijing Capital Airlines, Urumqi Airlines, Suparna Airlines, GX Airlines, Fuzhou Airlines and parent company Grand China Air are also parts of the program.
column2: 该公司的子公司香港航空、吉祥航空、天津航空、首都航空、乌鲁木齐航空、金鹏航空、北部湾航空、福州航空以及母公司大新华航空也参与该计划。

column1: It is also possible for passengers to collect miles on Alaska Airlines, Etihad Airways, Virgin Australia, TAP Portugal and the airlines that have codeshare agreements with Hainan Airlines.
column2: 乘客也可以在阿拉斯加航空、阿提哈德航空、维珍澳洲航空、葡萄牙航空以及与海南航空达成代码共享协议的航空公司积攒里程。

column1: Members can earn miles on flights as well as through consumption with Hainan Airlines's credit card.
column2: 会员可以通过飞行以及使用海南航空信用卡进行消费来获得里程。

column1: When enough miles are collected, members can be upgraded to Elite members which are divided into four tiers: Fortune Wings Platinum membership, Gold membership, Silver membership, and Flying Card membership.
column2: 积攒到足够的里程数时，会员可以升级为精英会员，分为四个等级：金鹏白金卡会员、金卡会员、银卡会员和飞行卡会员。

column1: Elite membership get extra services.
column2: 精英会员可获得额外的服务。

column1: Hainan Airlines is one of ten airlines worldwide rated as five-star by Skytrax, along with All Nippon Airways, Asiana Airlines, Cathay Pacific, EVA Air, Garuda Indonesia, Japan Airlines, Lufthansa, Qatar Airways, and Singapore Airlines.
column2: 海南航空被 Skytrax 评为全球十家五星级航空公司之一，其他几家为全日空、韩亚航空、国泰航空、长荣航空、印尼鹰航、日本航空、汉莎航空、卡塔尔航空和新加坡航空。

column1: In June 2019 they were ranked #7 in the Skytrax World's Top 10 Airlines of 2019 ratings and were winners in the following additional categories: Best Airline in China: World's Best Business Class Amenities, Best Airline Staff in China, Best Airline Cabin Cleanliness in China, Best Cabin Crew in China.
column2: 2019 年 6 月，在 Skytrax 的 2019 年世界十大航空公司评选中排名第 7，还获得以下类别的奖项：中国最佳航空公司：世界最佳商务舱设施、中国最佳航空公司员工、中国最整洁航空公司、中国最佳空乘。

column1: As of January 2017, Hainan Airlines operates seven bases across China: Beijing– Capital, Guangzhou, Haikou, Hangzhou, Sanya, Shenzhen and Xi'an.
column2: 截至 2017 年 1 月，海南航空在中国各地运营七大基地：北京-首都、广州、海口、杭州、三亚、深圳和西安。

column1: It operates an extensive network across the People's Republic of China, connecting Asia, Europe, North America and Oceania.
column2: 该公司在中国境内运营大规模网络，连接亚洲、欧洲、北美洲和大洋洲。

column1: It serves nearly 500 domestic and international routes and flies to more than 90 cities.
column2: 提供近 500 条国内和国际航线的服务，飞往 90 多个城市。

column1: Hainan operates international regular flights and offers charter flights to 51 various destinations in 28 countries such as flights from Beijing to Almaty, Toronto, Berlin, Brussels, Seattle/Tacoma, St. Petersburg, Moscow, Tel Aviv, Chicago, Las Vegas, San Jose/Silicon Valley and Boston; Beijing, Xi'an, Dalian, Guangzhou, Haikou to Taipei; Beijing, Haikou, Nanning to Bangkok; Hefei via Haikou to Singapore and others.
column2: 海航经营国际定期航班，并提供飞往 28 个国家 51 个不同目的地的包机服务，如北京至阿拉木图、多伦多、柏林、布鲁塞尔、西雅图/塔科马、圣彼得堡、莫斯科、特拉维夫、芝加哥、拉斯维加斯、圣何塞/硅谷和波士顿；北京、西安、大连、广州、海口至台北；北京、海口、南宁至曼谷；合肥经海口至新加坡等航班。

column1: Hainan also received official approval from the US DOT to begin nonstop flights between Beijing and Chicago.
column2: 海航还获得美国交通部正式批准，开通了北京与芝加哥之间的直飞航班。

column1: As of June 2014, Hainan began servicing Boston directly with a four-times-weekly 787 flight from Beijing Capital International Airport.
column2: 截至 2014 年 6 月，海航开通从北京首都国际机场直飞波士顿的服务，每周四趟 787 航班。

column1: It was the first direct flight between Boston and China.
column2: 这是波士顿与中国之间的首个直飞航班。

column1: The airline began service in the second quarter of 2013 with the Boeing 787 Dreamliner aircraft.
column2: 该公司于 2013 年第二季度开始使用波音 787 梦想飞机提供服务。

column1: It was the first Chinese carrier to offer flights between the two cities.
column2: 它是第一家提供这两个城市间航班的中国航空公司。

column1: Flights from Beijing-Capital to Chicago-O'Hare began on 3 September 2013.
column2: 北京首都国际机场至芝加哥奥黑尔国际机场的航班于 2013 年 9 月 3 日开通。

column1: On 23 October 2015, Hainan announced flights to Manchester, United Kingdom, starting in summer 2016.
column2: 2015 年 10 月 23 日，海航宣从 2016 年夏季起，开通飞往英国曼彻斯特的航班。

column1: Hainan announced the launch of a direct route between Beijing and Calgary, Canada, as of 30 June 2016.
column2: 海航宣布从 2016 年 6 月 30 日起，开通北京至加拿大卡尔加里的直达航线。
